translation.en: That's a charge!
translation.zh: 你撞人犯规！

translation.en: -Oh, you inbred pile of donkey shit! -[crowd gasps]

translation.en: What did you say?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: You four-eyed fuck! Come on!

translation.en: That was a fucking block, and you know it in your heart.
translation.zh: 他明明只是在阻挡对手 你心知肚明

translation.en: You know it was a block!
translation.zh: 他只是在阻挡对手！

translation.en: Come on, Ben. Are we really doing this again?

translation.en: These guys are a foot fucking taller than us, Jeremy!

translation.en: You gotta call it even on both sides, ya prick!
translation.zh: 只能算打平 蠢货！

translation.en: Ben, I do not want to "T" you again. The game is basically over.
translation.zh: 老班 我懒得说你违反体育道德了 -比赛本质上已经结束了-什么？操你妈！

translation.en: Well, fuck you!
translation.zh: -比赛本质上已经结束了-什么？操你妈！

translation.en: It's not my fault
translation.zh: 这是我的错吗？

translation.en: that the hamster that you tied to a string and shoved up your ass
translation.zh: 你用绳子系住一只仓鼠然后把它塞进屁眼里

translation.en: chewed off the string,
translation.zh: 结果它咬断了绳子

translation.en: and now you're standing there with a piece of string,
translation.zh: 如今你愣在一旁 手中握着那条绳子

translation.en: but the hamster's eatin' away at the inside of your asshole!
translation.zh: 而那只仓鼠则在你的屁眼里一阵狂咬！

translation.en: Knock it off, Hopkins!
translation.zh: 闹够了 霍金斯！

translation.en: Oh, fuck you, Greg. You're the one who probably
translation.zh: 操你妈 格雷戈 你搞不好是第一个

translation.en: shoved the hamster up there in the first place.
translation.zh: 把仓鼠塞进屁眼里的蠢货

translation.en: Oh, fuckin'... My fucking life!
translation.zh: 他妈的 去这他妈的人生！

translation.en: We're getting pounded inside
translation.zh: 我们被搞得很惨

translation.en: the way your momma pounds your fucking sister!
translation.zh: 就像你妈操你妹一样！

translation.en: All right! You had your fun, but that's it.
translation.zh: 行了 你闹够了 到此为止

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -You're out of here!

translation.en: Good! I wanna be outta here 'cause this is a shitshow.
translation.zh: 很好！我早就想滚了这场比赛烂透了

translation.en: -Come on, Coach. -And this is a circus!
translation.zh: -教练 别这样-这简直就是马戏团表演

translation.en: And this is not basketball.
translation.zh: 这根本不是篮球赛

translation.en: This is Barnum and fuckin' Bailey's.

translation.en: [player] Come on. No more. No more! Come on. This is crazy!

translation.en: But after they took away the elephants and it's not as fun!

translation.en: It's gonna be hard to sleep tonight for me, guys.
translation.zh: 各位 今晚我肯定睡不好

translation.en: This one's on me.
translation.zh: 都是我的错

translation.en: This one goes on my permanent record.
translation.zh: 这事就记录在我的永久黑名单里吧

translation.en: I let my emotions get the best of me again.
translation.zh: 我又情绪失控了

translation.en: I've coached you not to make the same mistake,
translation.zh: 我教你们不要再犯同一个错

translation.en: and then I made it.

translation.en: I deserve not to be listened to and not to be respected,
translation.zh: 你们可以不再听我的 不再尊敬我

translation.en: but you do listen to me, and you do respect me.
translation.zh: 但你们依然听我的 依然尊重我

translation.en: And I owe it to you to apologize, and that's what this is.

translation.en: Let's put it behind us. I apologize.
translation.zh: 让我们放下过去 对不起

translation.en: It's OK, Coach.
translation.zh: 不要紧的 教练

translation.en: It was actually one of your funnier meltdowns.

translation.en: [Ben] Marcus, if you're listening to Billy Joel again, I swear to God...

translation.en: Huh? Oh, sorry. I was listening to "Glass Houses,"
translation.zh: 对不起 我在听他的《玻璃屋》

translation.en: Billy Joel's second-best album.
translation.zh: 也就是比利乔尔第二棒的专辑

translation.en: Crap! I don't want my team psyching themselves up to Billy fucking Joel.

translation.en: We're the shortest team in the league.
translation.zh: 我们是联盟里球员平均身高最矮的球队

translation.en: But you can't teach size. I can't teach size!
translation.zh: 但身形是教不出来的我教不出身形来！

translation.en: My problem is I care too much.
translation.zh: 我的问题是我太在乎了

translation.en: I love this game!
translation.zh: 我爱比赛

translation.en: I love basketball,
translation.zh: 我爱篮球

translation.en: and I love this team.
translation.zh: 我也爱这支球队

translation.en: Right here.
translation.zh: 也就是你们

translation.en: I love you guys.
translation.zh: 我爱你们

translation.en: I love coaching you guys.
translation.zh: 也很享受指导你们

translation.en: You're missing the point, Coach.
translation.zh: 教练 你搞错了

translation.en: Oh, and what's the point, DJ?

translation.en: Coach, you said if we won the game, you'd give us your Bang Bus password.

translation.en: Well, we lost.
translation.zh: 但我们输了

translation.en: Well, we want it anyway.
translation.zh: 但密码还是得给我们

translation.en: No! I'm sick of always bein' a pushover.

translation.en: Not anymore! I'm sticking to my guns this time.
translation.zh: 我不会再盲目听命于人了这次我要坚守立场

translation.en: Come on, Coach. I wanna see some banging on some buses!

translation.en: Fine. Username: BOOBIES.
translation.zh: 算了 帐号是“咪咪”

translation.en: Password: LOVETOLICKEM.
translation.zh: 密码是“LOVETOLICKEM”

translation.en: Both case-sensitive, all caps.
translation.zh: 两者都区分大小写都是大写英文字母

translation.en: And make sure you spell "boobies" with ten "Os." "BOOOOOOOOOOBIES."
translation.zh: 记住 是“咪咪” 两个字一个“口” 一个“米”

translation.en: What about Scott?
translation.zh: 那斯考特呢？

translation.en: Yeah, what about me?
translation.zh: 对啊 我呢？

translation.en: What, the Bang Bus doesn't pick up gay guys?

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 就是没有！

translation.en: Look, I don't have any memberships to any of the gay sites.

translation.en: That's not fair!
translation.zh: 那不公平啊

translation.en: Right, guys?
translation.zh: 对吧 各位队友？

translation.en: [all] Bullshit! Bullshit!
translation.zh: 骗人！

translation.en: -[all] Bullshit! -All right! All right! Shut up! Jesus!

translation.en: I wish you guys were this unified on the fucking court.

translation.en: Here's my credit card. Go buy yourself something handsome.

translation.en: Sorry. Is this a bad time 'cause that kid with the baby inside of her is here?

translation.en: -Yes. -No.
translation.zh: -没错-不会

translation.en: Listen, the school board is coming down hard on my ass.

translation.en: They're sick of your crap.

translation.en: We have to make some changes around here, or I'm screwed.
translation.zh: 我们必须做出一些改变不然我就麻烦大了

translation.en: The school board is coming down hard on your ass?

translation.en: Language, Opal. This is a school, for fuck's sake!

translation.en: Ben, you know how it works here as well as I do.

translation.en: You can't be an asshole and a losing coach.

translation.en: In Kentucky, baby, winning cures all.

translation.en: Look, you've only lasted this long because your father is Barry Hopkins.

translation.en: Oh, enough about my dad.

translation.en: Sure, he played pro basketball,

translation.en: but he doesn't know the first thing about coaching.

translation.en: Opal, I don't have time for your bullshit. I gotta coach.

translation.en: No, you gotta win.

translation.en: The school board is coming to the game on Saturday.

translation.en: I'm not playing with you, Ben.

translation.en: If they don't see any hope, it's over.

translation.en: Opal, there's only one way this school has a chance at winning,

translation.en: and you know he won't play.

translation.en: That's not an "OP." That's a "BP."

translation.en: -What? -That's not an Opal problem.

translation.en: It's a Ben problem.

translation.en: Then just fucking say that, not this OP, BP bullshit.

translation.en: I did! That's what I said!

translation.en: That's not what you said.

translation.en: You said, "This isn't an OP. This is a BP."

translation.en: That means nothing to me!

translation.en: Listen, I'm hipping you to the fact!

translation.en: I'm telling you, you oughta know me by now.

translation.en: When I tell you something, I mean what I'm saying. That's it!

translation.en: Well, let me hip you to the fact that I'm getting this kid to play,

translation.en: and I'm saving my job.

translation.en: Coach, for the millionth time, the answer's no.

translation.en: Just play on the team, friend.

translation.en: I'm not your friend.
translation.zh: 我不是你的朋友

translation.en: You're a crazy-ass teacher with zero boundaries.

translation.en: You've got a gift, Matty.

translation.en: Being tall ain't a gift. It sucks, bro.

translation.en: Being able to fart on command, that's a gift.

translation.en: What Jeff Dunham does with those puppets, that's a gift.

translation.en: Fuck this, man.

translation.en: If I wasn't seven feet tall, you wouldn't even care about me.

translation.en: Matty, look at me.

translation.en: I'm begging you.

translation.en: I am in the position of submission.

translation.en: Your dick is in my face.

translation.en: This is how low I am.

translation.en: Then move.

translation.en: But if I start winning, I get a college gig,

translation.en: and then the pros start calling. And then the next thing you know,

translation.en: I'm coaching the Chicago Bulls, and I got an infinity pool.

translation.en: I mean, if I had an infinity pool,

translation.en: whoa, everybody would be sucking so many of my dicks.

translation.en: You gotta tighten it up, dog.
translation.zh: 你应该收敛点 老兄

translation.en: I'm just a 16-year-old kid.

translation.en: You can't be talking to me about dicks getting sucked.

translation.en: Please, Matty! If you join the team,
translation.zh: 麦迪 求求你 要是你加入球队

translation.en: you'll get to be part of something that is bigger than yourself.
translation.zh: 就能创下超越你自己的成就

translation.en: Lame sauce.
translation.zh: 老套

translation.en: I wasn't finished. You'll also get an iPad, first-generation.
translation.zh: 我还没说完我也将获得一台第一代iPad

translation.en: It's got a small crack in the screen, but I've downloaded Little Man Tate to it,
translation.zh: 虽然屏幕上有一小道裂痕但我下载了《小男人泰德》

translation.en: which, if you haven't seen, is a very heartwarming film.

translation.en: I'm seven feet tall, man.

translation.en: I'm not interested in "little man" anything.

translation.en: All right. I didn't want to do this, but you're forcing my hand.

translation.en: I've got something in my back pocket I'm gonna offer to you.

translation.en: It's pussy, Matty.
translation.zh: 嫩逼 麦迪

translation.en: You have a vagina in your back pocket?

translation.en: No, I don't have a vagina in my back pocket.

translation.en: Are you serious?

translation.en: You're a 16-year-old kid.

translation.en: Don't tell me sex isn't the only thing you think about

translation.en: 'cause I know you'd be lying.

translation.en: Look, if you penetrate a woman before Saturday, will you play in the game?

translation.en: I mean... I... Well...

translation.en: Say no more, you little pervert! I will get it done!

translation.en: I would have made it if not for you, Ron, you bad luck charm.

translation.en: But thanks for coming. I need your help.

translation.en: I gotta get this Matty kid laid ASAP so he'll play on the team.

translation.en: As long as we're talking about inappropriate things,

translation.en: you can't be texting my girlfriend, "You up?" every night.

translation.en: I knew she was up.
translation.zh: 我就知道她还没睡

translation.en: Listen, Shannon's my wife. I can text her whenever I want.

translation.en: No, Shannon's your ex-wife.

translation.en: Not yet, she isn't. I haven't signed the divorce papers.

translation.en: And if I'm honest, I'm not sure I'm gonna.

translation.en: and I've been very cool about you dating my wife,

translation.en: so I'd appreciate it if you were cool about me texting her
translation.zh: 希望你也不会介意 我在吃过安眠药后还是睡不着时发短信给她

translation.en: when I'm up lonely on sleeping pills.
translation.zh: 我在吃过安眠药后还是睡不着时发短信给她

translation.en: Yeah. You know, I guess you are being cool.
translation.zh: 也对 看来你真的不介意

translation.en: No wonder we're best friends.

translation.en: I'm sure you'll move on from my girlfriend eventually, right?

translation.en: I doubt it. Whatever. Keep fucking my wife, Ron.
translation.zh: 不清楚 随你怎么想尽管操我老婆吧 老罗

translation.en: Oh, good. You're listening.
translation.zh: 很好 你们都在听

translation.en: Ladies, would any of you date Matty?

translation.en: Ugh! You couldn't pay me to go out with Billy Bob Thyroid.

translation.en: What?

translation.en: Roxanne, you're saying you literally wouldn't date Matty, even if I paid you?

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa! He's just playing around. [chuckles]

translation.en: Coach, you can't pay someone to date Matty.

translation.en: Holy shit! That's it!

translation.en: I'm doing everything for you.
translation.zh: 这不就什么是都帮你做了吗？

translation.en: So you pay me to fuck this Matty kid, and you get an infinity pool?

translation.en: Ben, I'm a hooker, not an idiot.

translation.en: Essentially, yes.

translation.en: You're skipping the part about all my dicks being sucked,
translation.zh: 你漏了大家都会争先恐后地吃我鸡巴那一段

translation.en: but you seem to have a handle on it, Connie.
translation.zh: 柯妮 这种事我相信你应付得了

translation.en: OK. Anyway, it's $500 for penetration, but I can give him a blower for 250.
translation.zh: 插入收500美元口交只收250美元一次

translation.en: You're telling me that fucking is twice as much as a blow job?

translation.en: Fucking?

translation.en: Most of the time, with fucking, you just gotta lay there.

translation.en: until the global economy inevitably collapses.

translation.zh: 我用那些孩子的钱为另一个孩子召妓买单

translation.en: You're a pervert.
translation.zh: 你真是个变态

translation.en: If you could sing or act, they'd make documentaries about you.
translation.zh: 要是你能唱能演你的人生搞不好会被拍成纪录片

translation.en: Shan, I'm pouring my heart out here.
translation.zh: 香农 我这是在对你掏心掏肺地说话

translation.en: I can't even talk to you anymore.
translation.zh: 我们已经谈不下去了

translation.en: You focus on all the wrong shit.
translation.zh: 你总是把焦点放在错的地方

translation.en: My dream just died.
translation.zh: 我的梦想已经完蛋了

translation.en: I have nothing... except for you.
translation.zh: 我什么都没有了！ -除了你-不行！

translation.en: [Shannon] No!
translation.zh: -除了你-不行！

translation.en: You have nothing.
translation.zh: 你什么都没有

translation.en: -Can I help you, sir? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 先生 需要帮忙吗？ 是

translation.en: Do you have something for a man whose dreams just died,
translation.zh: 有没有为失去梦想的人设计的套装？

translation.en: and now he's got to work at his dad's boring-ass basketball-themed steakhouse
translation.zh: 这个人下半辈子必须 在他爸那家无聊到死的篮球主题牛排屋打工

translation.en: for the rest of his life?
translation.zh: 在他爸那家无聊到死的篮球主题牛排屋打工

translation.en: Usually, the "I hate my dad" clothes are for women,
translation.zh: 一般上“我恨老爸”系列只为女性而设计

translation.en: but I'm sure we can find something.
translation.zh: 但我相信应该可以找到合适的

translation.en: Follow me!
translation.zh: 跟我走一趟

translation.en: You know, I should at least say goodbye to the guys.
translation.zh: 我应该跟他们说声再见才离开

translation.en: Where the heck have you been? The game's about to start.
translation.zh: 你到底去了哪里？比赛快开始了

translation.en: The school board is getting antsy.
translation.zh: 校董会快要发飙了

translation.en: I assumed I was fired.
translation.zh: 我已经被炒了吧

translation.en: I couldn't get Matty to play, and I was arrested for gettin' a hooker.
translation.zh: 我没办法说服麦迪加入球队还因为召妓被抓了

translation.en: You got arrested?
translation.zh: 你被抓了？

translation.en: Uh... If you didn't hear about it, then, uh, no, I didn't get arrested.
translation.zh: 既然你没听说过 那我没被抓

translation.en: Well, listen, Ben.
translation.zh: 老班 你给我听好

translation.en: I tried everything I could, but I think it would be best
translation.zh: “我已经尽力了不过我想你最好还是

translation.en: if you just put your resignation letter on my desk by tomorrow...
translation.zh: 在明天之前把辞呈放在我桌上”

translation.en: is what I would be saying if you didn't get Matty.
translation.zh: 这是如果你没把麦迪弄来我会说的话

translation.en: Wait. What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你到底想说什么？

translation.en: I'm saying you got Matty. Was that not clear?
translation.zh: 我是说：“你把麦迪弄来了”还不够清楚吗？

translation.en: I'm trying to be more fun. He's right over there.
translation.zh: 我只是想说得幽默点 他就在那边

translation.en: Holy shit!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Opal, you're right. That was way more fun!
translation.zh: 奥珀尔 你说得好 真幽默！

translation.en: I like it! I like it. You did a good job!
translation.zh: 我喜欢 你做得很好！

translation.en: What the hell are you doing here, friend?
translation.zh: 老兄 你怎么来了？

translation.en: Did Connie throw you a free one? That's why she's the best.
translation.zh: 柯妮免费跟你上床吗？难怪她是最棒的了

translation.en: Heart of gold, that woman.
translation.zh: 那个女人真是心地善良啊

translation.en: No, but what you did yesterday
translation.zh: 你搞错了 你昨天所做的一切

translation.en: was the nicest thing anyone's ever done for me.
translation.zh: 从来不曾有人对我这么好

translation.en: Failing to get you a hooker
translation.zh: 给你召妓失败

translation.en: was the nicest thing anyone ever did for you?
translation.zh: 是别人为你做过最好的事？

translation.en: Kid, you need better friends.
translation.zh: 小子 你真的很需要朋友

translation.en: It just showed that you really wanted me here.
translation.zh: 那说明你真的很希望我加入球队

translation.en: You know, no one in my entire life has ever wanted me anywhere.
translation.zh: 我这一生从来不曾有人这么渴望我加入

translation.en: You know, my dad left when I was--
translation.zh: 我小的时候 我爸就离开…

translation.en: Boring! You're here. That's what matters.
translation.zh: 无聊！重点是你人来了

translation.en: Matty, you're part of the team now,
translation.zh: 麦迪 你已经是球队的一分子了

translation.en: and we take care of each other here.
translation.zh: 我们从此都要互相照应

translation.en: I'm always gonna be there for ya.
translation.zh: 我会挺你到底

translation.en: Now, are we just gonna stand here and jerk each other off,
translation.zh: 现在我们要站在这里为彼此手交

translation.en: or are we gonna get out there and play some Colt basketball?
translation.zh: 还是代表小马队上场比赛？

translation.en: -Time-out! Did you see that? -[whistle blows]
translation.zh: 时间到！你们没看见吗？

translation.en: We won the tip.
translation.zh: 我们抢了开球

translation.en: We won the fucking tip!
translation.zh: 我们他妈的抢了开球！

translation.en: We haven't won a tip in eight years!
translation.zh: 这是我们八年以来第一次抢到开球！

translation.en: It's a new day in Lenwood, you fuckers!
translation.zh: 伦伍德高中不再一样了你们这些狗娘养的！

translation.en: Yeah. [laughing]
translation.zh: 好耶

translation.en: You motherfuckers thought I couldn't do it.
translation.zh: 你们这些狗娘养的以为我做不到

translation.en: But the great Coach Hopkins proved you wrong.
translation.zh: 但超强的霍金斯教练证明你们错了

translation.en: Wrong! Wrong! Wrong! Wrong!
translation.zh: 错了

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: No one can take this moment away from me.
translation.zh: 这一刻谁也夺不走

translation.en: The fucking tip, motherfuckers, with a seven-foot fucking giant.
translation.zh: 抢开球的家伙是这个狗娘养的213公分巨人

translation.en: You're outta here!
translation.zh: 滚出去！

translation.en: Whatever you want.
translation.zh: 随便

translation.en: I don't care, Greg.
translation.zh: 不要紧 格雷戈

translation.en: Usually, that'd make me go nuts,
translation.zh: 通常这时我会发飙

translation.en: but you're looking at a whole new Coach Hopkins.
translation.zh: 不过你眼前的人已经是个全新的霍金斯教练

translation.en: I got my player. I got my job. I'm about to get my beautiful wife back.
translation.zh: 我弄来了新球员 我有工作就快挽回我的美女老婆了

translation.en: And my dad?
translation.zh: 至于我爸嘛

translation.en: He can go fuck his restaurant with all my dicks.
translation.zh: 让他用我所有的鸡巴去操他那家餐厅吧

translation.en: I'm sorry I let you down, Coach.
translation.zh: 对不起 我让你失望了 教练

translation.en: Let me down? We only lost by 16 points thanks to you.
translation.zh: 让我失望？我们才以16分差距败北这都要归功于你

translation.en: I can't remember the last time we got that close.
translation.zh: 我都忘记上次成绩这么接近是什么时候了

translation.en: The school board saw some real progress.
translation.zh: 校董会看见了球队正经历一些真正的进步

translation.en: Well, I guess I didn't hate it as much as I thought.
translation.zh: 看来我并没有想象中那么讨厌篮球

translation.en: Plus, it was pretty exciting when that cheerleader gave birth.
translation.zh: 再说刚才那个拉拉队员突然生孩子挺精彩的

translation.en: It sure was, wasn't it?
translation.zh: 是啊 对吧？

translation.en: The magic of basketball.
translation.zh: 这就是篮球的魔法

translation.en: Coach, I... I gotta say this feels like a family here, you know?
translation.zh: 教练 不得不说 我感觉这球队像个家

translation.en: And I need that because... after my dad left, my mom had to work some crazy--
translation.zh: 我需要一个家 因为自从我爸离开后我妈必须拼命…

translation.en: Boring! Sorry, the story was just really boring.
translation.zh: 无聊！不好意思 这故事无聊透顶了

translation.en: No, I get it. It was... It was pretty boring. You're right.
translation.zh: 我懂 确实挺无聊的 你说得对

translation.en: Matty, come here, you tall, lanky weirdo.
translation.zh: 麦迪 过来你这个瘦得只剩皮包的高个子

translation.en: I gotta say, I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship,
translation.zh: 我只能说：“这就是一段美好友谊的开始”

translation.en: and that right there is a quote from Little Man Tate.
translation.zh: 这是《小男人泰德》的经典台词

translation.en: I think.
translation.zh: 好像是吧

translation.en: [Ben] It didn't download properly. I never got to see the whole movie.
translation.zh: 没下载好 我从来不曾看完整部电影
